# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:


* Short name: `incontinence`
* Variable label: `Incontinence`
* Variable description: `It measures if the participant has experienced loss of urine (or has used any special device for urine leakage) or not.`
* Domain: `Health status and functional limitations`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | Yes
1        | No
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

# Data process

## England

### Wave 1 

#### Study-specific variable description




| **Name** | `heinct`|
|-|-|
| **Label** | `During the last 12 months, have you lost any amount of urine beyond your control?` |
| **Table name** | `wave_1_core_data_v3` |
| **Categories** | `1 = Yes; 2 = No` |
| **Missings** | `-9 = Refusal; -8 = Don't Know; -1 = Not applicable` |
| **Description** |  |


```{r local w1, echo=F}
ELSA_w1_incontinence <- ELSA_w1
vari <- ELSA_w1_incontinence$heinct
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-1,-8,-9))[3], caption = "heinct")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-1,-8,-9))[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(ELSA_w1_incontinence, aes(x=factor(heinct))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Incontinence") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `1 into 0` 
* `2 into 1` 
* `-9 Refusal into 997` 
* `-8 Don't know into 998` 
* `-1 Not applicable into 996` 

**R script:**
```{r harmo w1}
ELSA_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w1_incontinence$id)
ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence <- car::recode(ELSA_w1_incontinence$heinct, "1 = '0';2 = '1';-9 = '997';-8 = '998';-1 = '996' ")
ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence, labels = c(Yes=0, No=1,Missing=999, Do_not_know=998, Refuse=997, Not_applicable=996, Does_not_answer=995,  Not_attempt_not_done=994, Disable_to_measure=993, Impute=992, CAPI_interviewer_error=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w1, echo=F}
vari <- ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "incontinence")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(ELSA_ds_w1, aes(x=factor(incontinence))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Incontinence") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w1, echo=F}
AfterH <- table(ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence)
X<-table(ELSA_w1_incontinence$heinct)
BeforeH <- X[c(4,5,3,1,2)]
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("1->0","2->1","-1->996","-9->997","-8->998") 
kable(C)
```





```{r importOPAL_w1, echo=F}

label(ELSA_ds_w1$incontinence) <- "Loss of urine beyond control"
#opal.assign.data(o, 'ELSA_ds_w1', ELSA_ds_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'ELSA_ds_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
incontinence <- ELSA_ds_w1
save(incontinence, file = "../RData/w1/incontinence.RData")

ELSA_m_ds_w1 <- ELSA_ds_w1
ELSA_m_ds_w1$incontinence <- car::recode(ELSA_m_ds_w1$incontinence, "c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997,998, 999)=NA")
#opal.assign.data(o, 'ELSA_m_ds_w1', ELSA_m_ds_w1)
#opal.symbol_import(o,'ELSA_m_ds_w1', project='_Athlos_Harm_Dataset')
```

### Wave 7 

#### Study-specific variable description




| **Name** | `HeInct`|
|-|-|
| **Label** | `Incontinence: whether lost urine beyond control in last 12 months?` |
| **Table name** | `wave_7_elsa_data` |
| **Categories** | `1 = Yes; 2 = No` |
| **Missings** | `-8 = Don't Know; -1 = Not applicable` |
| **Description** |  |



```{r local w7, echo=F}
ELSA_w7_incontinence <- ELSA_w7
vari <- ELSA_w7_incontinence$HeInct
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-1,-8))[3], caption = "HeInct")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(-1,-8))[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(ELSA_w7_incontinence, aes(x=factor(HeInct))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Incontinence") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variable it has to be recoded as follows:

* `1 into 0` 
* `2 into 1` 
* `-8 Don't know into 998` 
* `-1 Not applicable into 996` 

**R script:**
```{r harmo w7}
ELSA_ds_w7 <- tibble(id=ELSA_w7_incontinence$id)
ELSA_ds_w7$incontinence <- car::recode(ELSA_w7_incontinence$HeInct, "1 = '0';2 = '1';-9 = '997';-8 = '998';-1 = '996' ")
ELSA_ds_w7$incontinence <- labelled(ELSA_ds_w7$incontinence, labels = c(Yes=0, No=1,Missing=999, Do_not_know=998, Refuse=997, Not_applicable=996, Does_not_answer=995,  Not_attempt_not_done=994, Disable_to_measure=993, Impute=992, CAPI_interviewer_error=991))
```

#### Statistical description of the new harmonised variable
```{r descript w7, echo=F}
vari <- ELSA_ds_w7$incontinence
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[3], caption = "incontinence")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(ELSA_ds_w7, aes(x=factor(incontinence))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Incontinence") + ylab("Frequency")
```

#### Validation
```{r crosstabulation w7, echo=F}
AfterH <- table(ELSA_ds_w7$incontinence)
X<-table(ELSA_w7_incontinence$HeInct)
BeforeH <- X[c(3,4,2,1)]
C <- rbind(BeforeH,AfterH)
colnames(C) <- c("1->0","2->1","-1->996","-8->998") 
kable(C)
```
